name: 原研哉·空
description: 日式极简风格，大量留白

styles.container: max-width: 640px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 28px 24px 80px 24px; font-family: "Hiragino Sans", "PingFang SC", "Microsoft YaHei", sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 2.5 !important; color: #333 !important; background-color: #fff !important; word-wrap: break-word;

h1.base: font-size: 24px; font-weight: 300; color: #000 !important; line-height: 2 !important; margin: 80px 0 60px; letter-spacing: 0.5em; text-align: center; padding: 0;

h2.base: font-size: 18px; font-weight: 300; color: #333 !important; line-height: 2 !important; margin: 70px 0 40px; letter-spacing: 0.3em; padding-left: 40px;

h3.base: font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; color: #666 !important; line-height: 2 !important; margin: 60px 0 30px; letter-spacing: 0.2em;

base.base: font-size: 15px; font-weight: 400; color: #999 !important; line-height: 2 !important; margin: 40px 0 20px; letter-spacing: 0.1em;

list.item: margin: 30px 0; line-height: 2.5 !important; color: #666 !important; padding-left: 40px; position: relative;
list.taskList: margin: 30px 0; line-height: 2.5 !important; color: #666 !important; padding-left: 40px; position: relative; list-style: none;

code.block: margin: 50px 0; padding: 40px; background-color: #f9f9f9 !important; border: none; border-radius: 0; overflow-x: auto; line-height: 2 !important;
code.inline: font-family: "SF Mono", Menlo, monospace; font-size: 13px; padding: 4px 8px; background-color: #f5f5f5 !important; color: #666 !important; border-radius: 2px;

styles.quote: margin: 40px auto; padding: 0; background-color: transparent !important; border: none; color: #999 !important; font-size: 14px; line-height: 2.2 !important; text-align: center; max-width: 480px; letter-spacing: 0.2em;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; max-height: 500px !important; height: auto; display: block; margin: 60px auto;
styles.link: color: #999 !important; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #e0e0e0; padding-bottom: 2px;

table.header: background-color: transparent !important; padding: 20px; text-align: left; border-bottom: 1px solid #e0e0e0; font-weight: 400; color: #999 !important;

styles.hr: margin: 80px auto; border: none; width: 40px; height: 1px; background-color: #e0e0e0 !important;

footnote.ref: color: #999 !important; text-decoration: none; font-size: 0.8em; border-bottom: 1px solid #e0e0e0; padding-bottom: 2px;
footnote.backref: color: #999 !important; text-decoration: none; font-size: 0.8em; border-bottom: 1px solid #e0e0e0; padding-bottom: 2px;
